body.title: Format
body.elms:
```
CACHE MANIFEST
# version

CACHE:
http://www.google.com/jsapi
/assets/app.js
/assets/bg.png

NETWORK:
*
```

Note that Appcache is deprecated!

See: [Using the application cache](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Using_the_application_cache) _(developer.mozilla.org)_
